pageContext.claim: “'Last night House Judiciary Chairman Jerry Nadler admitted that Democrats are pursuing Impeachment because it’s too dangerous to simply let the American people pick the next president in 2020.' @kilmeade @FoxNews”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. What Nadler said and many Democrats have echoed is, "We cannot rely on an election to solve our problems when the president threatens the very integrity of that election." In other words, Democrats say one consideration for impeachment is that Trump is trying to rig the U.S. presidential election in his favor by pressuring Ukraine to announce investigations into Democrats.
